features: ELIMINATES ODORS FOR UP TO 90 DAYS - The Odor Eliminator Gel Beads will continue to neutralize and eliminate odors for up to 90 days in up to 450 square feet. Each Gel Bead will leave behind a light and pleasant fragrance that is not overpowering.

MADE WITH ESSENTIAL OILS - Each Odor Eliminator Gel Bead contains 12 Ounces of product. The products are made with plant derived ingredients and formulated with a blend of essential oil based fragrances which adds a distinct and unforgettable aroma to any area you place and use the jar.
MADE IN THE USA - Every Odor Neutralizing Gel Bead is proudly Made in the USA.

SAFE AND EFFECTIVE FORMULA - The Gel Beads were developed with safety in mind. Simply remove the top label and open the jar to remove the interior liner and screw the cap back on. For maximum effectiveness, place in a well ventilated area.

USE ANYWHERE RECURRING ODORS ARE A PROBLEM - Use the Gel Beads in your home, bathroom, closet, office, RV, boat etc. to remove odors from smoke, garbage cans, pet areas, food and anywhere recurring odors are a problem.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Odor is not overpowering but soft and pleasant.
reviews.reviewText: I liked that the bathroom was always pleasant smelling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Poor delivery & handling service
reviews.reviewText: Great scent but unfortunately now the smell is embedded into my hands, after opening the mailing pouch I realized The container was leaking. Though the Container was wrapped in plastic, It still manage to leak into the mailing pouch. I have to assume it’s from the way it was handled during the delivery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Be practical with your expectations and product choice
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a product to simply over power an area with a strong fragrance without care whether it actually neutralizes nearby odors then this product isn't for you (go by a plug in oil warmer instead.) This doesn't generate a strong scent. This appears to be primarily sodium chlorite in glycerol solution, slowly dissolves then reacts to release chlorine dioxide vapors to breakdown nearby odor molecules. This needs some degree of air flow, so don't put it in your garbage can put a bag over it and expect that it will neutralize the odors, nor is it practical to put it in bottom of a clothes hamper then bury it with clothes and expect it to do miracles. Place it next to the garbage or hamper instead. If you are using this to mask odors coming from your air vents, keep in mind that leaving it over a hot air return will cause it to get used up faster. Similarly this is not a substitute for a potpourri pot and is not best located next to a fireplace. After 3.5 weeks just over half the containers contents have broken down and been used up. If I'm lucky this will last a max of 7 weeks in total. 49 days is considerably far off from 60 to 90 days. It effectively eliminates odors in a limited proximity (3-4' radius from placement in all directions.) The closer to odor source the better, or try to centralize its placement for largest area of coverage (far less effective tucked in corner of room on floor unless that is the source of odor.) In general I think it is a far stretch to think this will last anyone 60-90 days. In a small closed off closet kept at 60degrees (or lower) this may last a little longer then 49 day (reach 60 days,) but for most practical placement applications it will be used up long before 60 days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars regular house odor barrier was my aim. too flowery but pleasant.
reviews.reviewText: regular flowery scent was heavy but pleasant.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely no value for the money. It provides no odor covering or fragrance in the room whatsoever. You have to hold the jar up to your nose and shake it to know if it has a fragrance in it at all. Do not waste your money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars They last a long time
reviews.reviewText: I love these! They last a very long time if you refill them with water when the beads dry out. They re-hydrate and are still fragrant! I've refilled mine as many as 5 or more. I use them in my bathrooms and near kitty litter boxes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars What Happened To The Quality?
reviews.reviewText: I’ve ordered this product a total of three times. The first time I received it, it was amazing. I followed the directions and ended up putting it under the back of my front passenger’s seat. For a good two months, I could smell the freshness every time I got in my car. So I ordered it again and the freshness was gone in a week or so. I didn’t let that discourage me. We live in a world of mass produced products. There’s bound to be some duds out there. Then when I got the same lack luster performance when I ordered the product for the third time, that was disappointing. Now I’m thinking I need to just move on to something else. I don’t want to gamble anymore on whether or not I’ll get the great experience and product I had when I originally ordered this air freshener.

reviews.reviewTitle: Little pricy but have very fresh smell
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent but the scent only keeps one week and little bit pricy

reviews.reviewTitle: odor masking gel beads .. unsure if neutralises
reviews.reviewText: the scent is extremely strong. neutralizing odor and masking it are two different things. i may check for activated charcoal based product someday. i am now weary of odor neutralizing merchandise. most seem to be false advertising. loosing faith in what i read in many product descirptions.

reviews.reviewTitle: アップルシナモンの香りではない
reviews.reviewText: アップルシナモンの香りを求めるならこの商品はおすすめしません。

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 2, 2014
reviews.reviewText: Makes the room smell pleasant, but is very strong, so I found myself closing it up after a while as it became quite overpowering. I suppose it depends on how badly your room needs freshening.

Excellent product. Best odor eliminator on the market! Will continue to purchase this product. There were a few month lag when this product was not available from Amazon forcing us to go with an inferior product. Happy that is available once again on Amazon.
